name: John's Links
tagline: Links to talks and other resources
body:
### Articles and Publications
* [Planet Orion](http://planetorion.org/news/author/john/)
* [e4 Technical Overview](http://www.eclipse.org/e4/resources/e4-whitepaper.php)
* [Official Eclipse 3.0 FAQs](http://www.amazon.com/Official-Eclipse-3-0-FAQs/dp/0321268385/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1221163807&sr=8-1)
* [How You've Changed! Responding to resource changes in the Eclipse workspace](http://www.eclipse.org/articles/Article-Resource-deltas/resource-deltas.html)
* [Project Builders and Natures](http://www.eclipse.org/articles/Article-Builders/builders.html)
* [Using Images in the Eclipse UI](http://www.eclipse.org/articles/Article-Using%20Images%20In%20Eclipse/Using%20Images%20In%20Eclipse.html)
* [Drag and Drop in the Eclipse UI](http://www.eclipse.org/articles/Article-Workbench-DND/drag_drop.html)

### Talks and Workshops
* [EclipseCon France 2015: Orion on the road to Continuous Delivery](https://github.com/jarthorn/EclipseCon/raw/master/France2015/continuous-delivery-20150625.pdf)
* [EclipseCon France 2015: What's new in Orion](https://github.com/jarthorn/EclipseCon/raw/master/France2015/whats-new-orion-20150625.pdf)
* [Rapidly building web and mobile applications with cloud technology](http://dpi-canada.com/sites/default/files/pdw2015workshops.pdf)
* [EclipseCon 2015: Introduction to Eclipse Cloud Developer Tooling](https://www.eclipsecon.org/na2015/session/introduction-eclipse-cloud-developer-tooling)
* [EclipseCon 2015: Adapting JDT to the cloud](https://www.eclipsecon.org/na2015/sites/default/files/slides/jdt-cloud.pdf)
* [Develop and Deploy a Watson Analytics App using Bluemix, Node.js, and DevOps Services](https://portal.ibmeventconnect.com/wps/portal/interconnect/site/SampleAgenda/SessionFinderSA/SessionDetailPageSA/!ut/p/z0/pY9RT8IwFIX_Sn3gcWnt5sDHSdgYZMYoROyLudu6Udm60RaQf28BJWBCjOGl7UnvPed8mOEZZhLWogQjGgmV1W_Mf_dpQoYBoWMy7fkkCNwweho_0ijp4hFm-wEak753O4omvZAE0fMwHNyHrjf2dg7iY7lkAWZZIw3_NHgm7K2skjwzqBKpArXtEC0MtyfUbcWh5DIHq7jWtkkhZM6VhmPcxT7_jjsE6OMLHbI6ZL8uTYe4XUJ_c_aieMc5ieKXeEDJw7WcRkG20N-A3cs59ArAoslWGoHioE_ofrDNtuXnSiMHucSphVwZjuYgc-3Yr02jFnretLsmVCX9pMSsBTN3hCwaPDt1OFd_-bULlt5V6_rVYel2E9x8AXQTzwY!/)
* [EclipseCon Europe 2014: Panel Discussion: Cloud Computing and the Future of Development](https://www.eclipsecon.org/europe2014/session/panel-discussion-cloud-computing-and-future-development)
* [EclipseCon Europe 2014: Project Flux: Connecting developer tools across desktop and web](http://jarthorn.github.io/JavaOne2014/flux/index.html#/)
* [JavaOne 2014: Connecting the Eclipse IDE to the Cloud-Based Era of Developer Tooling](http://jarthorn.github.io/JavaOne2014/flux/index.html)
* [JavaOne 2014: Do You Really Get Your IDE?](https://oracleus.activeevents.com/2014/connect/sessionDetail.ww?SESSION_ID=1724)
* [EclipseCon France 2014: Connecting developer tools across desktop and web with Project Flux](https://jarthorn.github.io/EclipseConFrance2014/flux/)
* [EclipseCon 2014: API Design with Java 8](https://jarthorn.github.io/EclipseCon2014/java8/)
* [EclipseCon Europe 2013: Developing for the Cloud, in the Cloud, with Eclipse Orion](https://www.eclipsecon.org/europe2013/developing-cloud-cloud-eclipse-orion-presented-ibm)
* [Tutorial: End to end web application development with Orion](http://github.com/jarthorn/OrionEndToEnd)
* [EclipseCon France 2013: Orion deployed: Orion goes from prototype to production](http://www.eclipsecon.org/france2013/sessions/orion-deployed-orion-goes-prototype-production)
* [EclipseCon Europe 2012: The Future of Eclipse](http://www.eclipsecon.org/europe2012/sessions/eclipse-5)
* [EclipseCon 2012: Extending Orion](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2012/sessions/extending-orion)
* [EclipseCon 2012: SDK's Greatest Hits: The First Ten Years](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2012/sessions/eclipse-sdks-greatest-hits-first-ten-years)
* [EclipseCon 2011: The Orion Workspace and Server](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2011/sessions/?page=sessions&id=2258)
* [EclipseCon 2011: A busy year for the Eclipse platform](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2011/sessions/?page=sessions&id=2259)
* [EclipseCon 2009: A deep dive into the platform resource model](http://www.eclipse.org/platform-core/documents/presentations/resources-deep-dive.pdf)
* [EclipseCon 2009: What's the Context? The e4 programming model](https://www.eclipse.org/e4/resources/contexts.pdf)
* [EclipseCon 2007: Cool stuff in Equinox](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2007/index.php?page=sub/&id=4243)
* [EclipseCon 2007: Versioning plug-ins is good for you](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2007/index.php?page=sub/&id=3941)
* [EclipseCon 2007: Eclipse APIs and Java 5](http://eclipse.org/eclipse/presentation/eclipsecon/API-Tutorial-EclipseCon-2007.pdf)
* [EclipseCon 2006: Designing Eclipse APIs](http://eclipsezilla.eclipsecon.org/php/attachment.php?bugid=151)
* EclipseWorld 2005: Developing Applications With the Eclipse Rich Client Platform (RCP)
* EclipseWorld 2005: Power User Central: Getting the Most Out of Your Eclipse Experience
* [EclipseCon 2005: Eclipse Concurrency In Action](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2005/presentations/EclipseCon2005_Tutorial7.pdf)
* [EclipseCon 2004: Writing responsive UIs using the Eclipse 3.0 concurrency architecture](http://www.eclipsecon.org/2004/EclipseCon_2004_TechnicalTrackPresentations/39_Arthorne-Lemieux.pdf)
